name: Swerea MEFOS
goal:
Swerea MEFOS create, refine and convey research results in process metallurgy, heating, metalworking, the environment and energy technology. Our customers are found in the steel, iron, alloy and base metal industries as well as among environmental companies and equipment suppliers.

We carry out applied research to meet customer needs for technology and expertise and contribute to economic and competitive production.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EIP Raw Materials, EIT Raw Materials
SPIRE / Horizon 2020
